--- In junit@y..., Denis Labaye <d.labaye@l...> wrote:
> You should use an ActiveTestSuite instead of a TestSuite.
> A TestSuite run tests sequentially, an ActiveTestSuite run tests in
> parallel.
>
> Hope this help
>
> Denis
